acf.module_short_description: A comprehensive exploration of advanced technical SEO.
acf.module_long_description: In this module, we take a more comprehensive look into the more advanced aspects of technical SEO. Learn about site speed and CDNs as well as understand mobile SEO, JavaScript and International SEO.
acf.video_url: <iframe title="Module 10: Advanced Technical SEO -  Free Advanced SEO Textbook Online 2020 | The SUSO Method | SUSO" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/xxQYpRnbQVY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
acf.content:
Mastering the fundamentals of technical SEO can only get you so far. To truly elevate your search presence, you need to go beyond the basics. In this module, you will learn about advanced technical SEO strategies and concepts that will help you dominate the SERPs.

We will show you how to optimise your website’s speed and JavaScript as well as highlight the importance of using content delivery networks. For SEO professionals looking to rank in multiple markets, we have a dedicated chapter on International SEO.
